item.title: About
item.description: I’m a self-taught developer who went to tell one computer what to do (suddenly there were dozens of itâ€¦ and lately there have been hundreds) and is currently working to improve reliability in large-scaled distributed systems through automation alongside the pillars of observability (logs, metrics, traces). Here are a few of my open-source contributions. If you wish to send me something that only myself is able to read, encrypt your email with my pgp key and send to devbytom@gmail.
